agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Business & Industry TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./ recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, April 30, 2019 PLACE: E2.016 CHAIR: Rep. Trey Martinez Fischer The committee will meet to hear invited testimony from a Texas business leader regarding the Texas business climate and industry trends. After that, the committee will hear public testimony on the following: HB 591 Holland Relating to seller's disclosures regarding fuel gas piping in residential real property. HB 660 Shaheen Relating to property owners' association fines. HB 1305 Meza Relating to a cost-of-living increase applicable to death benefits paid under the workers' compensation system. SB 934 Hancock | et al. Relating to judicial review of certain workers' compensation disputes. SB 498 Huffman | et al. Relating to a commercial landlord's or tenant's remedies regarding certain unlawful activities in a multiunit commercial property. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
